Related repos

  • Music discovery for self-hosted music systems
  • media server for streaming music to AirPlay, Chromecast, Roku, and more
  • Desktop client for Subsonic and Jellyfin music servers with gapless playback
  • Streams audio to hardware players and software emulators
  • Self-hosted music player for local audio files
